sentences.sContent: Murchison followed with his eye the hand of his chronometer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Murchison followed with his eye the hand of his chronometer.
sentences.sCn: 莫奇生的眼睛追随着他的时计的秒针。

sentences.sContent: 'Where's Walter, I wonder! ' said Solomon Gills, after he had carefully put up the chronometer again. 'Here's dinner been ready, half an hour, and no Walter! '
sentences.sContent_eng: 'Where's Walter, I wonder! ' said Solomon Gills, after he had carefully put up the chronometer again. 'Here's dinner been ready, half an hour, and no Walter! '
sentences.sCn: “不知道沃尔特在哪里！”吉尔斯把精密计时表重新小心地藏好以后，说道，“晚饭已经准备好半个小时了，可是却不见沃尔特！”

remMethod.val: chron (时间) + o + meter (测量) → 测量时间 → 计时计

trans.tranOther: a very exact clock, used for scientific purposes
